note: Records after 2000 are not automatically shown as there is a reporting lag, which means values for these years are underestimated.
title: Global first records of non-native species
subtitle: The number of [established alien species](#dod:established-alien-species) and the year they were first recorded outside of their [native range](#dod:species-native-range). A species may be counted multiple times, once for each new country they are found in.
